amendment.description: To require a report from the Secretary of Energy on natural gas supplies and demand.

vote.text: Amendment SA 880 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 880 proposed by Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S7682-7684; text: CR S7682-7683) To require a report from the Secretary of Energy on natural gas supplies and demand.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 880 proposed by Senator Alexander.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 880 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
